channel.title: Question!
channel.description: Ok i having a probelm here.. [code] else if(useItemID == 1275 && atObjectID == 2491)[/code] ok not really a probelm..but i have to Right-Click "Use" Item 1275(Rune Pick) on Object 2491(Stone) to get a ess.. My question is what do i do so,when i have Rune Pick in my hand and click on the object i get ess without having to Right-Click "Use". If you do not understand me...here a EX. I have an axe in my hand and i click on tree i start cutting...not having to Right-Click "Use". Thanks Btw if everyone wonding why i'm asking for all these Ess relation Question i'm adding it on my server NO I'M NOT MAKING A TUT. [br][size=1]Posted on: May 22, 2007, 03:38:37 PM[/size][hr]Does anyone know how to..?

Omg,second time you help me and you have the time to make this for me(i think)YOU ARE GOD

item.title: Question!
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Put this above case 299:

case 2491: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0){ if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1265 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1267 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1269 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1271 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1273 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1275){ sendMessage("You mine some rune essence"); addItem(1436, 1); addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[14]), 14); actionTimer = 1; setAnimation(625); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sendMessage("You need to be weilding a pickaxe!"); } } break; }

Read full topic

item.title: Question!

I have an axe in my hand and i click on tree i start cutting…not having to Right-Click “Use”.
Thanks
